Description: THE GRANT WILL SUPPORT THE CONSTRUCTION OF A GREENHOUSE AND THE PURCHASE OF AGRICULTURAL PRODUCTION PRODUCTS.
THE GRANT WILL SUPPORT THE REHABILITATION OF A CATTLE DIP TANK TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF DISEASE AMONG THE HERDS IN THE REGION.
THE GRANT WILL SUPPORT THE REHABILITATION OF A CATTLE DIP TANK TO PREVENT DISEASE AMONG CATTLE IN THE SURROUNDING AREA.
THE PRODUCTION OF ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY CHARCOAL BRIQUETTES PRODUCED FROM AGRICULTURAL WASTE.

THE PURPOSE OF THIS COOPERATIVE AGREEMENT IS TO CONTINUE CT SUPPORT TO THE STRONG CITIES NETWORK WITH AN EMPHASIS ON OPERATIONALIZING THE NEW REGIONAL HUB MODEL AND IMPROVING NETWORK GOVERNANCE AND PROGRAM MONITORING AND EVALUATION.

TO DEVELOP AND IMPLEMENT STANDARD OPERATING PROCEDURES TO ENABLE MORE EFFECTIVE USE OF INFORMATION AND OBJECTS COLLECTED OR OBTAINED DURING COUNTERTERRORISM OPERATIONS TO SUPPORT CIVILIAN CRIMINAL INVESTIGATIONS AND PROSECUTIONS IN THE PHILIPPINES.
TO SUPPORT THE REHABILITATION AND REINTEGRATION OF FTF FAMILY MEMBERS IN THE KYRGYZ REPUBLIC AND TAJIKISTAN.
THIS PROGRAM WILL INCREASE THE GOBF CAPACITY TO SECURELY MANAGE ITS BORDERS BY MEANS OF COLLECTING, STORING, AND ANALYZING TRAVEL INFORMATION AT MAJOR AIRPORTS AND OTHER STRATEGIC POINTS OF ENTRY.
